message.body: i'm all done! you want me to get anything for us for lunch while i'm down here?
Thanks but no on the lunch. My lean pockets just now came out of the oven. Are you saying you dont want a ride?
is it not sprinkling anymore? i guess i can just walk home.
I am not outside so i dont know the weather. I asked you if you were trying to tell me that you didnt want a ride. I still dont know.
let me go outside once i pay and i will tell you.
it's still sprinkling and the clouds look bad. i'll go have some lunch to give you some time to eat, is that okay?
so i can have a ride, i mean. please.
I can give you a ride to lunch too he you want. Pockets travel well.
i just ordered at ladles. you can totally wait like 30/40 minutes.
Works for of. Let me know when you are ready.
i'm ready whenever you are! no hurry though.
